author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEXTER BECOMES A STORM-FORCE EXTRATROPICAL LOW OVER THE NORTH ATLANTIC... ...THIS IS THE FINAL NHC ADVISORY...
summary: ...DEXTER BECOMES A STORM-FORCE EXTRATROPICAL LOW OVER THE NORTH ATLANTIC... ...THIS IS THE FINAL NHC ADVISORY... As of 11:00 AM AST Thu Aug 07 the center of Dexter was located near 41.4, -50.4 with movement ENE at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Post-Tropical Cyclone Dexter (AT4/AL042025)
